name: desert
sentence: In the arid wasteland, lives are ended in the blink of an eye... Blink too long and you might end up missing more than your life.
description: Behold, Daeron's first stage made specifically for our Z2 characters! This one is based off some Capcom work..taking some elements here and there, but adding plenty of new ones as well! This is your go-to stage for your Goku vs Vegeta match-ups! The most catchy thing about this stage would be the added Yajirobe background character, who watches the fight safely from behind the rocks.
dlcText: Stage Music (Saibamen theme by WizzyWhipItWonderful)

name: desert storm
sentence: The sand violently leaves its mark against the skin, however, violence drives its point home harder.
description: A variation of his initial stage; Desert Storm is a more proper version of some Saiyan Saga action! There is some heavy dust and sand flying all over. It might obscure things a bit, but there's where the fun lies with this stage! Come on, give it a go...
dlcText: Stage Music (Desert Storm theme by WizzyWhipItWonderful)

name: arctic
sentence: The wind chills with a cold demeanor.. the battle burns hotly regardless.
description: A fight on a floating body of ice? Sounds like fun. Who'd have known, this is where the Red Ribbon army hides? Looks like their base of operations is pretty wiped out... No time to enjoy the scenery anyway, keep moving or your feet'll freeze to the surface! Put up your dukes!
dlcText: Stage Music (Arctic - Dynamic theme by WizzyWhipItWonderful)

name: time chamber fire and ice
sentence: Sizzling flame and freezing gusts of wind disperse through the arid whiteness...
description: Behold, the innards of the Hyperbolic Time Chamber, or the Room of Spirit and Time, whichever you prefer! This is top Training stage material!!
dlcText: Stage Music (Hyperbolic Time Chamber theme by WizzyWhipItWonderful)

name: time chamber aurora
sentence: Deep inside the depths of the chamber, ancient gears and clockwork grind time to a still...
description: This is the alternate version of the Time Chamber, which has the aurora in the background, based off it's appearance in the DBZ Budokai games.
dlcText: Stage Music (Moon Battlefield theme by WizzyWhipItWonderful)

name: tenkaichi budokai
sentence: Legends are not born, they are forged, molded and tempered under the heat of battle. This sacred arena has forged the greatest champs the world has seen. All may enter the Tenkaichi to test their mettle, but few become champs.
description: A stage that's long overdue, here is our version World Tournament! It's after-hours, so no crowd. The download comes with both the regular version and the Announcer version.
dlcText: Stage Music #1 (Mr.Satan theme by DaMarcus008)
Stage Music #2 (World Tournament by WizzyWhipItWonderful)

name: tenkaichi budokai night
sentence: its a party in the sky and a celebration in the arena. The world budokai tenkaichi martial arts tournament has gathered once more, champions from around the world with majestic techniques and fantastic skills. Who will become the Grand Champion?
description: While everyone is out partying, you lot are solitarily duking it out...well...have at it!
dlcText: Stage Music (Future Trunks theme by DaMarcus008 x WizzyWhipItWonderful)

name: saiyan pride
sentence: In space no one can hear you scream, some, will make a point out of making you scream.
description: There's one thing a Saiyan always keeps- his PRIDE! Even in SPACE!
dlcText: Stage Music (SSJ Vegeta theme by DaMarcus008)

name: space
sentence: In space, no one can hear you scream...except for the God of Destruction!
description: Under the watch of Beerus, fighters clash in the vastness of space. Among floating meteorite debris, the heat is on!
dlcText: Stage Music (To Go Even Further Beyond! by WizzyWhipItWonderful)

name: evo 2014
sentence: The city is dark but the roars and cheers of the crowd keep it alive. Witness history in the making
description: Who'd have thought a MUGEN game would get a side stream at an event as huge as EVO? Well, that's what happened back in 2014! We're glad to say the game's reception has been immensely positive and it's been streamed at a previous fighting game tournament, and we were so hyped to hear it will get played at EVO, so for that occasion, Daeron was chained and whipped until a 'thank you' stage came out of his hands and he delivered!
dlcText: Stage Music (Evo 2014 theme by WizzyWhipItWonderful)

name: gravity chamber
sentence: Your body will break. Your bones will shatter. Your muscles will twist. But your mind...your mind won't give up. This is the essence of training. Breaking and reforging yourself until you're a weapon that even the Gods will fear.
description: This is your new go-to Training Mode stage! This download contains both the 'gravity effects' version and the 'basic' variant (where things remain nice and unobstructed).
dlcText: Stage Music (Vegeta theme by DaMarcus008)
Stage Music (Gravity Chamber theme by WizzyWhipItWonderful)

name: mountain road
sentence: As the catastrophe looms, powerful blows are exchanged amidst the velocity and the chaos. At any moment the collision threatens to end this... but we all know it wouldn't stop there.
description: Have you got the stuff it takes to duke it out on top a moving truck's bed? Go and find out!
dlcText: Stage Music (Eighteen theme by DaMarcus008)

name: baba's palace
sentence: For the right price the seer will answer anything you ask... but if you dont have the cash, she'll let you earn it facing her legion of horrors. Mind that you don't become part of her collection.
description: The outside and entrance to the Seers Alcove stage! Baba awaits, her ghouly guards at the ready.
dlcText: Stage Music (Baba's Palace theme by DaMarcus008)

name: baba's palace night
sentence: Things darker and more dangerous might lurk in the shadows, but very few of them will be as delighted as they pull out your limbs one by one
description: Under the threatening eyes of many assassins, can you still perform at your peak level?
dlcText: Stage Music (Golden Freeza theme by DaMarcus008)

name: seer's alcove
sentence: The witch cackles her ugly laugh, she'll peer into your future, discern into your past, maybe even tell you about the tidings of the present that might've been. But she'll do it.. for a price.
description: A large room with in the center a large magical viewing globe, guarded by the witch Baba.
dlcText: Stage Music (Babidi's theme by DaMarcus008)

name: satan city
sentence: West city! What a place! The cars, the buildings, the super powered aliens fighting in the streets...
description: West City! Home of some famous legends like Captain Chicken and Mr Satan! Today however, West City is the showdown for some less famous individuals, it's certain to make it to the news! The battle is bound to happen here amidst the passing traffic, under the ever watchful eyes of the Champion, Mr.Satan!
dlcText: Stage Music (West City theme by WizzyWhipItWonderful)

name: satan city sunset
sentence: This is what you get for letting those damn Androids running around.
description: Hey! What the heck! It's on fire!
dlcText: Stage Music (Majin Vegeta's theme by DaMarcus008)

name: kame house
sentence: Legends speak of a hermit who has attained immortality, hidden away in the forgotten corners of the ocean...
description: Even in this sunny setting, the Z fighters have no chill and need to rough-house!
dlcText: Stage Music (Kame House theme by WizzyWhipItWonderful)

name: kame house sunset
sentence: The sunset holds promises for a thousand tomorrows. Move well! Learn well! Play well, eat well and rest well! Enjoy your lives, merrily and to the fullest! The Kame Style is with you
description: Even as the sun sets, there is still more rough-housing to be done!
dlcText: Stage Music (Krillin's theme by DaMarcus008)

name: turnip field
sentence: An healthy farmstyle livin' makes for a healthy farmer...and if some of 'dem aliens come messing about, Nozu's got a little piece of artillery lying around to deal with them critters.
description: Instead of fighting, wouldn't you rather pick some ripe turnips?
dlcText: Stage Music (Farmer's theme - Techno version by WizzyWhipItWonderful)

name: pilaf castle
sentence: You'll rue the day you crossed paths with the most glorious Indigo overlord
description: The gang's hideout and possible treasure storage.
dlcText: Stage Music (Pilaf's theme by DaMarcus008)

name: tenshin heights
sentence:
Life is like the wind, continuously flowing. Sometimes it's swift and soft and sometimes rough and violent. Calm and steady but able to destroy whole mountains.
The man that walks the windy mountain paths has become like the Crane,
the skies are his home and the mountains his perch.
description: A soft breeze stage to calm your thoughts and sharpen your skills
dlcText: Stage Music (TenShinHan's theme by DaMarcus008)

name: goku's house
sentence: The smell of baking fills the air, the freshly washed clothes hung to dry and the dinosaurs buzz happily around us. Welcome Home.
description: Goku fights his battles anywhere, even in his own backyard! It's also quite a nice place where he lives, he has an amazing cliff view where dinosaurs can be seen strawling or flying by. But Goku's favourite part of his home is without a doubt his wife Chi-Chi, which cooks him many a meal each day! He'll fight anyone or anything to protect her!
dlcText: Stage Music (Goku's theme by WizzyWhipItWonderful)

name: goku's house at night
sentence: The night has come and with it the calm and warm atmosphere of Mount Paozu. Everyone is asleep, even the dinosaurs and the beasts... well, not everyone.
description: Mount Paozu is a calm place, unheard of that anyone would even live there. Goku however has made it his home, right next to his grandpa's old house. The Son family welcomes any visitors, even at night.
dlcText: Stage Music (Goku House - Evening theme by WizzyWhipItWonderful)

name: namek
sentence: In the vast oceans of the planet of perpetual day, everything is calm... or is it?
description: Namek is another fine, fine example of Daeron's spriting skills. It turned out to be an instant favourite, with its vibrant colors and clear detailing. Note the Ginyu frog and Dende flying across being chased by some nasty Freeza Force soldiers!
dlcText: Stage Music (Namek theme by WizzyWhipItWonderful)

name: namek porunga
sentence: The Namekians are adepts of old arcane forces, weaving reality into wishing spheres being their ultimate weapon...come Porunga...grant us our wishes
description: The sky turns an eerie black and the immensely giant Namekian Dragon Porunga looms over the puny fighters.
dlcText: Stage Music (Porunga theme by WizzyWhipItWonderful)

name: namek dying
sentence: It's a race against the clock, as the very planet is minutes away from bursting!
description: Wild gusts of wind, gusts of lava licking your aura and the sky crimson as the blood of thousands that are inevitably about to perish. In that respect, a perfect backdrop for the powerful tyrant Freeza. But this is no time to be afraid. Giving up here means not only your certain demise, but also that of the entire population of Namek!
dlcText: Stage Music (Freeza's theme by DaMarcus008)

name: korin's tower
sentence: Legends tell of the white noble spirit that inhabits the tower, high in the sky, watching over the lands. The legends are partially right... for how noble can a spirit really be when he can be bribed with tuna?
description: You're gonna love this one. Korin zips around in the background, look at him go!
dlcText: Stage Music (Korin's Tower theme by WizzyWhipItWonderful)

name: neko majin gathering
sentence: A group of cats is called a nuisance, Yajirobe always wondered why. That is, until he met Korin's pals...
description: Alternate version of the Korin Tower stage. It's a full-on cat party! And nothing like that weird musical!
dlcText: Stage Music (Gohan's theme by DaMarcus008)

name: kami's lookout
sentence: High above the clouds, a God with watchful eyes cares over the planet.
description: Another homerun stage by Daeron, the Lookout stage has the combatants duking it out sky high!
dlcText: Stage Music (Vegetto's theme by DaMarcus008)

name: kami's lookout eclipse
sentence: The atmosphere turns eerie, the skies becomes thick and crimson. Tonight, the ghosts roam free!
description: Alternate version of the Lookout stage.
dlcText: Stage Music (Kami's Lookout theme by WizzyWhipItWonderful)

name: snake way
sentence: Those souls that did mighty acts in life find themselves upon the snakeway. Its long winding roads stuck between heaven and hell.. It's said that the Overseers of the universe await at the end, willing to bestow their gifts of training and power to those deserving.
description: You know what to look out for...don't fall off!
dlcText: Stage Music (Goku's theme by DaMarcus008)

name: enma's desk
sentence: At the gates of the dead he awaits, ready to balance all the deeds you done in life and decide your fate. That usually works out, but its a hard job that warrants all his attention... no commotions shall distract the great King Enma from his Godly work.
description: For purgatory, this place is pretty neat.
dlcText: Stage Music (Piccolo's theme by DaMarcus008)

name: king kai world
sentence: The indigo King awaits upon his planet, you've certainly faced many tribulations to get here warrior, but now you must appease the king. He demands a joke. Watch that you don't make yourself one.
description: Available in 'normal' and 'Endless' variants, which are both included in the download below! The Endless version, as you may expect, has no true walls, so you can circle around the planet over and over!
dlcText: Stage Music (SSJ Goku's theme by DaMarcus008)

name: inside Buu
sentence: If something can be said about the monster known as Buu, is that there is always room for dessert.
description: This place looks like it smells real nasty...
dlcText: Stage Music (Buu's theme by DaMarcus008)

name: T o P
sentence: 12 universes. Teeming with life, teeming with adventure, hope, sorrow, dreams and nightmares. And then there are the Gods, sitting on their thrones they throw their heralds at each other seeking to prove their universe's mettle. Aboard the Tournament of Power arena, all fight for the sake of their universes, heroes and villains alike. The clock is ticking, the Gods observe from above.
description: Wonderfully put together by spriter Pansh and tester/coder Toni, this stage is a true spectacle.
dlcText: Stage Music (Jiren's theme by DaMarcus008)

name: capsule corp hangar
sentence: Mastering the edges of science has become a hobby of sorts for the Briefs family. Everyone needs a place to keep their cool stuff and now everyone can keep it in their pocket.
description: Sprited by Pansh and coded by Toni.
dlcText: Stage Music (Capsule Corporation Hangar theme by WizzyWhipItWonderful)

name: sea coast
sentence: Bright blue skies and a waterfront for miles, a bargain the realtor said...and then the explosions started.
description: Sprited and coded with Hyper DBZ in mind by Bob Lee, he was kind enough to let us use his beautiful stages. The download includes both the daytime, night and sunset versions of the stage! Tweaks and edits done by  Toni.
dlcText: Stage Music (Sea Coast themes (all three variants) by WizzyWhipItWonderful)

name: planet zoon
sentence: Air thick as molasses, the gravity itself strapping everyone down. A person could easily be outmaneuvered by someone used to move around in these conditions...
description: Sprited and coded with Hyper DBZ in mind by Bob Lee, he was kind enough to let us use this stage. Tweaks and edits done by  Toni.
dlcText: Stage Music (Planet Zun theme by WizzyWhipItWonderful)

name: the husk of humanity
sentence: Humanity was resilient. Was. The gods thrive now in this dark place. However, this is not the end. It is not even the beginning of the end. But it is, perhaps, the end of the beginning.
description: Made by Alpha Proto and Toni and XGargoyle
dlcText: Stage Music (Goku Black's theme by DaMarcus008)

name: hell
sentence: There was supposed to be a place reserved in hell for me, and that place was the throne...not this, never this!!!!! Freeza screamed, unaware that nearby, the fairies and plush bears were coming to serenade him.
description: Sprited by Alpha Proto and coded by Toni.
dlcText: Stage Music (Freeza's Hell theme by WizzyWhipItWonderful)
